name: uzumaki kitsune
description:
UZUMAKI KITSUNE: A STAGEPLAY ABOUT HUNTED ANIMALS HUNTING ANIMALS: a curse knows a curse; two rabbits know each other

the question is never if you should trust, but if you can survive it.

a stageplay about the ways that trauma shapes us into symbolic animal behaviors where a wolf feeding on sheep will pretend he is merely a sheepdog, and those in his "flock" will consider themselves caged birds.
